comment: He received the criticism from past semesters and changed his course a bit to make it much better. If you show up to class and do the HW you'll be fine. I never opened up the textbook once during the semester. Also go to the SI sessions if you have the time it does help believe it or not.

There are 3 tests(lowest grade gets dropped) and a final. Also some HW but those took 20 mins each week. No attendance but if you show up he gives extra credit by 3 WHOLE points, so if you end with an 86.5 he literally bumps you to an A. All the complainers never showed up, or sat on their phones all class. You have to TRY to fail this class btw

This professor shows care and concern in class only dont bother him outside. His grading system as of December 2024 is a point system out of 100 and every homework is 1.5 points ,quiz .75, IF YOU GET A 100. The tests are weighted 20 points for the two and the final is a cumulative for 30 points. little time for testing.literally take anyone else

Accounting is a very difficult class but professor Trotman makes lectures funny and informative. He helps students with any questions and really cares for them. Exams are heavily proctored and you don't get a lot of time on them but just do the reviews and you'll be SOLID!

Prof Trotman was a very easygoing but straightforward guy. As long as you do the assignments (which are on Connect, so simple enough) you can pass easy. My best advice is to *DO THE REVIEWS*. Accounting is a difficult class, but do those and you'll do swimmingly.

I see comments hating on the final but the final isn't made by him, it's all of the accounting professors, so it's not fair to judge him for that. Accounting is a tough class but Trotman seemed like he wanted us to pass his class and made it as simple as possible. The class itself is hard because the tests are timed but that's not his fault

I had Professor Trotman for Accounting 1 and he was the best professor I've ever had at KSU. He is extremely understanding and caring and it feels like he truly wants you to succeed in his class. I would take him for all accounting classes if I could.

His homework and quizzes doesn't add up to anything only the exams basically determine your grade. Is not understanding when it comes to being a bit confused, and doesn't tell you your grade until after your final therefore you have no idea how you're doing the whole time. I wouldn't take this class at ALL.

Not a bad class until the final he said originally was going to be 15 questions then surprised us with 21 multiple choice questions with many journal entries many students simply ran out of time to complete test. Had an A in the class right up until the final exam. If he's your only option it'll be ok, but if you can take another professor I would.

This professor was ok, until I got to the final. This professor gave us 55 minutes to do 21 multiple parted journal entries. most students including me felt that there was not enough time to take the test. All his exams are 25 minutes no exceptions even if you have internet issues. Please take a better professor if you can.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: I feel betrayed. I loved his class until the final. Most people didn't even have enough time to finish. My grade was an A all semester just for the final that I studied for days to be too long to finish and it dropped my grade to a B. Oh also the final was cumulative.
So glad I got out while I still could this was a disaster.
Extra credit doesn't help at all waste of time.
Never again.
Tricks people into thinking that he's gonna be helpful for the rest of the semester only to keep you in the class never again.

Due dates are extremely tight projects are huge and take up most energy and time. He doesn't want to be bothered with questions unless its during the class and he doesn't actually help unless its technical.

Gives unreasonable amount of time for Exams. Literally only 25 minutes for each one. Homework points are worth almost nothing. His notes are different from the homework therefore making studying ten times harder. The test questions has like a hunred parts to them. And he's not very patient when it comes to asking for help. Wouldn't recomend.

Professor Trotman is an amazing accepting teacher if I could take him again I would. He made accounting so easy. I printed out the notes he goes over because it helps me remember better than typing. I don't know why he has such few ratings but I cannot express how much you need to take him trust me. Tests are exactly the same as review so do them.

TAKE HIM!! If you want to succeed you HAVE to go to class. He has notes already made you just have to fill them in as you go which is amazing. you will have homework and quiz every week or every two weeks (they are not long). there are three exams (lowest gets dropped) and he has study guides that are almost exact to the exams. TAKE HIM!!!!

his teaching method is the best of any professor ive had, i actually feel like im learning in this class instead of memorizing stuff off of a powerpoint. it is very much worth it to go to class, dont have to study at all as long as you do the in class work and get it right. only downside is tests are very short so you cant get much wrong

It's ACCT 2101, you are going to have to study. Connect homework only has two "check my work" which is a pain in the butt when you're confused and trying to figure out the material. Tests are IN PERSON with LOCKDOWN BROWSER and you only have 30 minutes to complete. I would not recommend this instructor to people that are not strong test takers.

he is funny and his lectures are very helpful if you pay attention. tends to rush through the material and doesn't fully explain all concepts. I would HIGHLY recommend attending the SI sessions that go along with the class if you want the concepts broken down. homework and quiz every week are very helpful for exam. he's nice but has strict policies
Good teacher keeps everyone engaged during lectures and gives in depth explanations. He is always willing to help TAKE HIM.

I would recommend taking him for accounting!! he made accounting so easy for me and believe me im not good in accounting. I recommend taking his practice exams !!! do it several times, they are similar to the exam and will help you pass. EASY A!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Test heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: Attendance is not mandatory but I HIGHLY recommend to attend class. Lectures are useful as he is kinda funny and explains the material where it is easy to understand. Reviews are very similar to tests!

This professor is an amazing professor for this course. He has very little homework and study guides for his tests that are almost the same test with different numbers. I am not going into accounting and I am not good at accounting, yet this professor makes its easy to understand. The only things I struggled on are the excel project and the final.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Doesn't give the best notes, and lectures seem almost pointless as he doesn't really explain much of anything. He's a nice guy but not necessarily the best accounting teacher.

Professor Trotman is a very nice person. However, his all of his test are taken in person. His tests average from 7-10 questions and the final is 15 questions. Additionally, he only gives students 30 mins to complete the tests and 1 hour on the final. He is not the most understanding when it comes to grading. I would not take him again.

Professor Trotman was truly amazing! Although attendance isn't mandatory I highly recommend attending class. Accounting is not easy, but Professor Trotman made it a tolerable class. I thought I was gonna fail but I ended up with an A. He also truly cares about each and everyone of his students. He will answer any question you may have!
If you are a finance major, I would take this prof.

He is the reason I passed this course with flying colors. He cares so much about his students and does everything in his power to make us pass. He gives great study material. I got a 100 on an exam. He gives extra credit and drops a few homeworks and quizzes. If accounting intimidates you, please take him, he is so amazing. its impossible to fail.

Take this professor and go to class! You can tell how passionate he is about teaching and great at explaining difficult concepts. He did everything he could to get his students to pass the class, encourages people to ask questions, and made the content easier to understand.

Professor Trotman was a great guide through accounting 101. He did everything he could for his students. He reviewed some work that the department wanted the accounting students to do, but he thought the work was unnecessary and unhelpful. So. He TOOK OFF THOSE ASSIGNMENTS, a crazy compassionate thing to do that you don't see in many teachers.

Professor Trotman is amazing. This was my first accounting course and I was really nervous because I heard that it would be difficult but Professor Trotman made it super easy and even fun!  You can really tell that he cares about his students and wants them to succeed. Attendance isn't required but go to class anyway! He does in class extra credit!

Professor Trotman is a good professor he makes sure the whole class is understanding the subject and he understands that some terms are new to the students so he'll do his best to explain what they mean. He does little practice work after learning a chapter just to make sure the students are understanding and he loves to answer questions.

trot is a goat. as far as accounting professors go, he's great. he was good at trying to make you understand and he knows the subject is difficult. sometimes his explanations were a bit nonsense, he'll dumb it down if you ask. he's extremely slow at answering emails. also cannot express how important going to class is. you wont pass if you don't go
